attributes.action: Amend The Education System for Those it Neglects
attributes.additional_details: It is the belief of myself and many others that certain current exams for students from the ages of 15-18 are lauded far too highly, and that pressure is put on students to neglect creative subjects and past-times to focus on academic learning. This is a dated system. It is WRONG, and UNJUST, and MUST be amended.
